functionPrototypes.description: Creating a job card outlining the details of a specific task or project, including objectives, instructions, and timelines, to guide the assigned personnel in their duties.

functionPrototypes.description: Generating a unique job number to serve as an identifier for tracking and managing specific tasks, projects, or orders within a system or organization.

functionPrototypes.title: Parts Procurement
functionPrototypes.description: The process of acquiring necessary parts or components for a project or operation, involving sourcing, purchasing, and managing inventory to ensure timely availability and smooth execution.

functionPrototypes.title: Repair Status
functionPrototypes.description: The current condition or progress of repairs being conducted on a particular item, equipment, or system, indicating whether it is in process, completed, or awaiting further action.

fieldPrototypes.title: Dismantle
fieldPrototypes.description: To dismantle is to take apart or disassemble a structure, machine, or device into its component parts.

fieldPrototypes.title: Prepare Estimate
fieldPrototypes.description: Creating an estimate involves compiling costs for materials, labor, and other expenses to provide a projected cost for a project or service.

fieldPrototypes.title: Pending Approval
fieldPrototypes.description: The status indicating that a request, document, or action is awaiting approval from the relevant authority or stakeholder before proceeding further.

fieldPrototypes.title: Work In Progress
fieldPrototypes.description: 'Work in progress' refers to task that is currently underway.

fieldPrototypes.title: Blocked
fieldPrototypes.description: 'Blocked' typically refers to a situation where progress on a task is hindered or halted due to some issue or dependency that needs to be resolved before work can continue.

fieldPrototypes.title: Quality Inspection
fieldPrototypes.description: Quality inspection involves assessing products or processes to ensure they meet predefined standards and specifications, aiming to identify defects or deviations that may impact quality.

functionPrototypes.description: Generating a proforma invoice detailing the cost of goods or services prior to their delivery or completion, often used for customs or preliminary payment purposes.

functionPrototypes.description: Confirming the receipt of payment for the proforma invoice in the accounts records.

functionPrototypes.description: Creating a challan involves generating a document that lists details of goods being transported, typically including quantity, description, destination, and other relevant information for regulatory or tracking purposes.

functionPrototypes.description: The customer is responsible for collecting the pump from the specified location.

functionPrototypes.title: Vendor Cost
functionPrototypes.description: Vendor cost refers to the expenses associated with procuring goods or services from a supplier, including the purchase price, shipping fees, taxes, and any additional charges incurred in the acquisition process.
